title: Iconic PITAKA x Aries x NoProblemo Glow-in-the-Dark Cases
description: Starsky and Hutch. Lennon and McCartney. Mario and Luigi. We’ve been treated to some pretty special duos in the past, and now we have another. Tech-accessory pioneer PITAKA and streetwear giant Aries, have buddied up to create a collection of glow-in-the-dark iPhone cases, making sure your cell is always the star of the show. Who … Continue reading Iconic PITAKA x Aries x NoProblemo Glow-in-the-Dark Cases →
author: Billy Webb
excerpt: In a sea of boring phone cases, the PITAKA × Aries × NoProblemo collection is a breath of fresh air. Discover more about this iconic collab, here.
text: Gadgets & Technology Sponsored We independently evaluate all recommended products and sercives. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation. Starsky and Hutch. Lennon and McCartney. Mario and Luigi. We’ve been treated to some pretty special duos in the past, and now we have another. Tech-accessory pioneer PITAKA and streetwear giant Aries, have buddied up to create a collection of glow-in-the-dark iPhone cases, making sure your cell is always the star of the show. In This ArticleWho is Pitaka and AriesThe CollectionWhy You'll Love TheseThe Glow-Up You Need ariesarise / Instagram Who is PITAKA? If you’re all about sleek design and premium phone protection, then you’ve probably heard of PITAKA. Known for its ultra-light, ultra-strong accessories crafted from cutting-edge materials, the brand focuses on innovation and humanistic spirit to push boundaries and offer cases that perfectly blend durability with minimalism. And Aries? Known for its iconic “No problemo” slogan, Aries is the rebellious streetwear brand that never plays by the rules. Founded by Sofia Prantera, the label has quickly gained a cult following for its bold designs and playful nods to ’90s youth culture; think luxury-meets-skateboarder. Its designs are unique, unapologetic, and always ahead of the curve. Sounds familiar, right? Why Collaborate? Why not? PITAKA and Aries are firmly in their own lanes and wished to further explore the extremities of material technology and fashion. By integrating PITAKA’s exclusive Lumintex™ fibers, the collaboration has given a fresh take on Aries’ artistry, resulting in wonderful woven cases that naturally glow. PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Alien  For those who like to keep an eye on style—literally. This case features Aries’ iconic alien graphic that glows in the dark for a striking visual experience. Lightweight but incredibly tough, it’ll keep your cell safe while turning heads at bars, parties, and after-work events. Don’t forget to tell everyone about the MagEZ grip capability. PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Credit Card Bringing a touch of individuality to your daily life, this one breaks new ground by showcasing first-of-its-kind text weaving made with aramid fibers. By testing new techniques, PITAKA has managed to seamlessly weave text onto the case. Whether you’re a night owl or just want your phone to double as a conversation piece, this light and slim accessory offers both protection and personality. PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – NoProblemo  Stress less, glow more—this is for the optimists, the creatives, and anyone who loves a little bit of whimsy with their practicality. With its playful, laid-back motto shining through in the dark, the NoProblemo case perfectly captures the easy-going Aries attitude. ipitaka.global / Instagram Why You’ll Love These Cases Lumintex™ These cases aren’t just cool—they’re high-tech. PITAKA’s latest breakthrough, Lumintex™, is a cutting-edge luminous fiber that offers unmatched thinness, flexibility, and brightness. It delivers a stunning glow that sets the cases apart, making them not only functional but also a head-turning accessory. Durability Crafted from military-grade aramid fiber, each iPhone case is incredibly tough, protecting your cell from everyday scratches and wear. Despite their superior durability, they remain ultra-thin and lightweight, so your phone stays sleek without the bulk of traditional protective cases. MagSafe Compatible These glow-in-the-dark accessories come fully equipped with strong magnets, ensuring seamless MagSafe compatibility. Whether you’re charging your phone or using MagSafe accessories, you’ll have all the convenience you need while still rocking your stylish, luminous case. Unique Touch Experience Beyond style and durability, you’ll enjoy a truly unique tactile experience. The distinctive weaving technique used for the aramid fiber provides a textured grip, giving you more control than a smooth case while adding a premium feel. ipitaka.global / Instagram The Glow-Up You Need In a sea of boring phone cases, the PITAKA × Aries × NoProblemo collection is a breath of fresh air. It’s more than just protection for your cell—it’s a fashion statement and an extension of your personality. With designs that blend Aries’ irreverent streetwear aesthetic with PITAKA’s commitment to quality and innovation, these cases offer something truly individual. Ready to glow? It delivers a stunning glow that sets the cases apart, making them not only functional but also a head-turning accessory. Despite their superior durability, they remain ultra-thin and lightweight, so your phone stays sleek without the bulk of traditional protective cases. MagSafe Compatible These glow-in-the-dark accessories come fully equipped with strong magnets, ensuring seamless MagSafe compatibility. Whether you’re charging your phone or using MagSafe accessories, you’ll have all the convenience you need while still rocking your stylish, luminous case. Unique Touch Experience Beyond style and durability, you’ll enjoy a truly unique tactile experience. The distinctive weaving technique used for the aramid fiber provides a textured grip, giving you more control than a smooth case while adding a premium feel. ipitaka.global / Instagram The Glow-Up You Need In a sea of boring phone cases, the PITAKA × Aries × NoProblemo collection is a breath of fresh air. It’s more than just protection for your cell—it’s a fashion statement and an extension of your personality. With designs that blend Aries’ irreverent streetwear aesthetic with PITAKA’s commitment to quality and innovation, these cases offer something truly individual. Ready to glow?
html:
• Gadgets & Technology
  • Sponsored

We independently evaluate all recommended products and sercives. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation.

Starsky and Hutch. Lennon and McCartney. Mario and Luigi. We’ve been treated to some pretty special duos in the past, and now we have another.

Tech-accessory pioneer PITAKA and streetwear giant Aries, have buddied up to create a collection of glow-in-the-dark iPhone cases, making sure your cell is always the star of the show.

In This Article

  1. Who is Pitaka and Aries
  2. The Collection
  3. Why You'll Love These
  4. The Glow-Up You Need

Who is PITAKA?

If you’re all about sleek design and premium phone protection, then you’ve probably heard of PITAKA. Known for its ultra-light, ultra-strong accessories crafted from cutting-edge materials, the brand focuses on innovation and humanistic spirit to push boundaries and offer cases that perfectly blend durability with minimalism.

And Aries?

Known for its iconic “No problemo” slogan, Aries is the rebellious streetwear brand that never plays by the rules. Founded by Sofia Prantera, the label has quickly gained a cult following for its bold designs and playful nods to ’90s youth culture; think luxury-meets-skateboarder.

Its designs are unique, unapologetic, and always ahead of the curve. Sounds familiar, right?

Why Collaborate?

Why not? PITAKA and Aries are firmly in their own lanes and wished to further explore the extremities of material technology and fashion. By integrating PITAKA’s exclusive Lumintex™ fibers, the collaboration has given a fresh take on Aries’ artistry, resulting in wonderful woven cases that naturally glow.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Alien 

For those who like to keep an eye on style—literally. This case features Aries’ iconic alien graphic that glows in the dark for a striking visual experience.

Lightweight but incredibly tough, it’ll keep your cell safe while turning heads at bars, parties, and after-work events. Don’t forget to tell everyone about the MagEZ grip capability.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Credit Card

Bringing a touch of individuality to your daily life, this one breaks new ground by showcasing first-of-its-kind text weaving made with aramid fibers. By testing new techniques, PITAKA has managed to seamlessly weave text onto the case.

Whether you’re a night owl or just want your phone to double as a conversation piece, this light and slim accessory offers both protection and personality.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – NoProblemo 

Stress less, glow more—this is for the optimists, the creatives, and anyone who loves a little bit of whimsy with their practicality. With its playful, laid-back motto shining through in the dark, the NoProblemo case perfectly captures the easy-going Aries attitude.

Why You’ll Love These Cases

Lumintex™

These cases aren’t just cool—they’re high-tech. PITAKA’s latest breakthrough, Lumintex™, is a cutting-edge luminous fiber that offers unmatched thinness, flexibility, and brightness. It delivers a stunning glow that sets the cases apart, making them not only functional but also a head-turning accessory.

Durability

Crafted from military-grade aramid fiber, each iPhone case is incredibly tough, protecting your cell from everyday scratches and wear. Despite their superior durability, they remain ultra-thin and lightweight, so your phone stays sleek without the bulk of traditional protective cases.

MagSafe Compatible

These glow-in-the-dark accessories come fully equipped with strong magnets, ensuring seamless MagSafe compatibility. Whether you’re charging your phone or using MagSafe accessories, you’ll have all the convenience you need while still rocking your stylish, luminous case.

Unique Touch Experience

Beyond style and durability, you’ll enjoy a truly unique tactile experience. The distinctive weaving technique used for the aramid fiber provides a textured grip, giving you more control than a smooth case while adding a premium feel.

The Glow-Up You Need

In a sea of boring phone cases, the PITAKA × Aries × NoProblemo collection is a breath of fresh air. It’s more than just protection for your cell—it’s a fashion statement and an extension of your personality.

With designs that blend Aries’ irreverent streetwear aesthetic with PITAKA’s commitment to quality and innovation, these cases offer something truly individual.

Ready to glow?

Iconic PITAKA x Aries x NoProblemo Glow-in-the-Dark Cases

  • 15 October 2024
  • Billy Webb
SHARE ON

We independently evaluate all recommended products and sercives. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation.

Starsky and Hutch. Lennon and McCartney. Mario and Luigi. We’ve been treated to some pretty special duos in the past, and now we have another.

Tech-accessory pioneer PITAKA and streetwear giant Aries, have buddied up to create a collection of glow-in-the-dark iPhone cases, making sure your cell is always the star of the show.

In This Article

  1. Who is Pitaka and Aries
  2. The Collection
  3. Why You'll Love These
  4. The Glow-Up You Need

Who is PITAKA?

If you’re all about sleek design and premium phone protection, then you’ve probably heard of PITAKA. Known for its ultra-light, ultra-strong accessories crafted from cutting-edge materials, the brand focuses on innovation and humanistic spirit to push boundaries and offer cases that perfectly blend durability with minimalism.

And Aries?

Known for its iconic “No problemo” slogan, Aries is the rebellious streetwear brand that never plays by the rules. Founded by Sofia Prantera, the label has quickly gained a cult following for its bold designs and playful nods to ’90s youth culture; think luxury-meets-skateboarder.

Its designs are unique, unapologetic, and always ahead of the curve. Sounds familiar, right?

Why Collaborate?

Why not? PITAKA and Aries are firmly in their own lanes and wished to further explore the extremities of material technology and fashion. By integrating PITAKA’s exclusive Lumintex™ fibers, the collaboration has given a fresh take on Aries’ artistry, resulting in wonderful woven cases that naturally glow.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Alien 

For those who like to keep an eye on style—literally. This case features Aries’ iconic alien graphic that glows in the dark for a striking visual experience.

Lightweight but incredibly tough, it’ll keep your cell safe while turning heads at bars, parties, and after-work events. Don’t forget to tell everyone about the MagEZ grip capability.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – Credit Card

Bringing a touch of individuality to your daily life, this one breaks new ground by showcasing first-of-its-kind text weaving made with aramid fibers. By testing new techniques, PITAKA has managed to seamlessly weave text onto the case.

Whether you’re a night owl or just want your phone to double as a conversation piece, this light and slim accessory offers both protection and personality.

PITAKA × Aries Luminous Case – NoProblemo 

Stress less, glow more—this is for the optimists, the creatives, and anyone who loves a little bit of whimsy with their practicality. With its playful, laid-back motto shining through in the dark, the NoProblemo case perfectly captures the easy-going Aries attitude.

Why You’ll Love These Cases

Lumintex™

These cases aren’t just cool—they’re high-tech. PITAKA’s latest breakthrough, Lumintex™, is a cutting-edge luminous fiber that offers unmatched thinness, flexibility, and brightness. It delivers a stunning glow that sets the cases apart, making them not only functional but also a head-turning accessory.

Durability

Crafted from military-grade aramid fiber, each iPhone case is incredibly tough, protecting your cell from everyday scratches and wear. Despite their superior durability, they remain ultra-thin and lightweight, so your phone stays sleek without the bulk of traditional protective cases.

MagSafe Compatible

These glow-in-the-dark accessories come fully equipped with strong magnets, ensuring seamless MagSafe compatibility. Whether you’re charging your phone or using MagSafe accessories, you’ll have all the convenience you need while still rocking your stylish, luminous case.

Unique Touch Experience

Beyond style and durability, you’ll enjoy a truly unique tactile experience. The distinctive weaving technique used for the aramid fiber provides a textured grip, giving you more control than a smooth case while adding a premium feel.

The Glow-Up You Need

In a sea of boring phone cases, the PITAKA × Aries × NoProblemo collection is a breath of fresh air. It’s more than just protection for your cell—it’s a fashion statement and an extension of your personality.

With designs that blend Aries’ irreverent streetwear aesthetic with PITAKA’s commitment to quality and innovation, these cases offer something truly individual.

Ready to glow?
